content:
Loomi Co.'s construction team is truly efficient.
The Omni-Gallery is almost complete, and I just realized
I haven't calibrated my vernier caliper to the most precise measurement range...
info: 建馆期间墨尔斯_墨尔斯任务闲聊

content:
Once the Omni-Gallery is restored,
they'll be able to move into a premium ecological environment
regulated by "Microworld Bubbles!"
info: 建馆期间墨尔斯_墨尔斯任务闲聊

content:
No rest for me!
I must optimize my condition before the Omni-Gallery's completion!
I'll go ask Mr. Mobai for some of his special tea blend later.
info: 建馆期间墨尔斯_墨尔斯任务闲聊

content: My mentor's research largely relies on\nthe collections here as its foundation,\nand I have absolute confidence in our Omni-Gallery.
info: 建馆期间墨尔斯_墨尔斯任务闲聊

content: The Omni-Gallery of Revelare Academia is arguably the largest Omni-Gallery in the world today.
info: 建馆期间墨尔斯_墨尔斯任务闲聊

content:
With the unique ecosystem along <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>,
I'm certain we'll discover even more
new species and phenomena that others haven't found yet!
info: 建馆期间墨尔斯_墨尔斯任务闲聊

content:
Hmm... When my paper is published in the Academia,
I shall put your name first in the acknowledgments section,
whether you like it or not!

content:
The Omni-Gallery is under construction,
and the previously collected specimens are thriving
in their ecological spheres.
